Timed.isInTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x553b4546d26f383d4f4a056b7f50dadff07fb252.sol#77-80) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= (startTime - avarageBlockTime) && ! isTimeExpired() (/unique_chucks/14/0x553b4546d26f383d4f4a056b7f50dadff07fb252.sol#77-80)

Timed.isTimeExpired (/unique_chucks/14/0x553b4546d26f383d4f4a056b7f50dadff07fb252.sol#82-86) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp + avarageBlockTime >= endTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x553b4546d26f383d4f4a056b7f50dadff07fb252.sol#85-86)
